item.title: Shannan (prefecture) Travel Guide (Tibet/Southwest China/China/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Shannan (prefecture) is a hidden gem in Tibet, with its rich history, amazing natural scenery, and cultural significance. In this comprehensive travel guide, we've laid out everything you need to know about Shannan (prefecture) - places to visit, hiking/biking routes, food, accommodations, local culture and customs, safety, and nearby destinations.
